1. Q&A: AI is coming for lots of jobs. What about that of the cancer researcher?  STAT
  2. The question everyone’s asking: Will AI replace writers?  The Indian Express
  3. Sam Altman, CEO of ChatGPT-maker OpenAI, says this job will not be replaced by AI  The Times of India
  4. AI Probably Won’t Replace Us, But Money Might | by The AuDHD Philosopher | Sep, 2024  An Injustice!
  5. Column: Please, don't feed the AI -  The Daily Tar Heel
